My main tasks:

•	Development of new business
•	Budget Responsible / net profit
•	Implementation of business plan ‘The DACH Challenge’, written by myself.

With NOVO, clients have a decisive say in where and how they want to live, and what kind of daytime activity they want to do. The 1,200 employees of NOVO work for more than 1,500 children and adults with a mental disorder. In the province of Groningen, but since recently also in Drenthe, NOVO can be found on more than 80 locations. NOVO has a regional structure. There are five regions, namely: North, Central, Urban, South-East and Youth.

The regions contain various locations for living and daytime activities. NOVO has:
•	Residential communities for children
•	Day care centres
•	Residential communities and service centres for adults
•	Daytime activity facilities
•	Guest houses
•	Provision of ambulatory services', 'title': 'Supervisory Board Member', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': "Foundation Social Guest House 'Huize Bartje',", 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 1996}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Assen, The Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 1996}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2006}}, 'company': "Foundation Social Guest House 'Huize Bartje',", 'description': 'During my study I was asked to join the management board of the guest house. With a relatively very low budget, WISH quickly became one of the larger internet service providers in the Netherlands thanks to a creative marketing policy (e.g. by free publicity). After about one year WISH, purchased for NLG 400,000 (approx. EUR 180,000), was sold for NLG 100 million (EUR 45 million) to the public company Newconomy by means of a trade sale. Later on, WISH became part of internet provider Tiscali.

Spearheads:
•	Internal organisation
